2. Ethical/legal
Linked anonymized does not exist as term for GDPR. That would be pseudonymized, if there exists a link with a patient ID somewhere, and therefore needs to be treated as personal data. 
5. Data preservation
KULeuven policy expects data to be kept fro 10 years: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/policy
6. Data sharing
Instead of Mendeley Data or Zenodo you could use KU Leuven RDR: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr
